docs.snippet: Sixty-four marines, the first of a contingent of 265 selected to guard valuable mails in this city, will report at the General Post Office in Eighth Avenue at Thirty-second Street this morning.
docs.lead_paragraph: Sixty-four marines, the first of a contingent of 265 selected to guard valuable mails in this city, will report at the General Post Office in Eighth Avenue at Thirty-second Street this morning.
docs.abstract: 265 marines assigned to guard mail trucks, railroad terminals and post office stations

headline.main: MAILS IN TRANSIT UNDER ARMS TODAY; 255 Marines Are Assigned to Trucks, Trains, Terminals and Post Office Stations. $20,000 HOLD-UP REWARD Additional $5,000 Reveals That Four Instead of Three Bandits Took Part in Leonard St. Robbery.

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Nov. 18 (Associated Press).--Pope Benedict, in a cablegram to President Harding, has expressed the hope that Almighty God may "grant a happy issue to the initiative taken by the Chief Magistrate of the great American republic to...
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Nov. 18 (Associated Press).--Pope Benedict, in a cablegram to President Harding, has expressed the hope that Almighty God may "grant a happy issue to the initiative taken by the Chief Magistrate of the great American republic to tranquillize the trepidation of humanity."
docs.abstract: message to Pres Harding on opening of arms and Pacific parley

headline.main: POPE COMMENDS HARDING INITIATIVE; Vatican Message to President Tells of Imploring Happy Issue for Conference. BACKING FROM CIVIL RULERS King George, Emperor Yoshihito and Many Others Send Expressions of Encouragement.

docs.snippet: Two live stock shows with exhibits from all parts of the country are held each year in Uruguay to encourage breeders to improve the type of their stock. The National Stock Show at Montevideo, almost exclusively a cattle show, last year had its...
docs.lead_paragraph: Two live stock shows with exhibits from all parts of the country are held each year in Uruguay to encourage breeders to improve the type of their stock. The National Stock Show at Montevideo, almost exclusively a cattle show, last year had its fifteenth annual exhibition.
docs.abstract: Ranchers from all parts of Uruguay bring exhibits to Natl Stock Show at Montevideo

headline.main: LIVE-STOCK SHOWS POPULAR IN URUGUAY; Ranchmen From All Parts of the Country Bring Exhibits and Competition Is Keen. HIGH PRICES AT AUCTIONS Heifer Calves Imported From the United Status Win First and Second Prizes.
